content: The Terracotta Warriors are located about 40 kilometers east of the Xian city center. It takes approximately one hour to get there by car or bus. There are several options for transportation, including taking a tour bus, taxi, or public bus. Many hotels and tour operators in Xian provide tours to the Terracotta Warriors, which include transportation, admission fee, and a tour guide. You can choose the option that best suits your needs and interests.
